ygData.subject: Re: Bard list gettogether
ygData.msgSnippet: I  would happly take the dive. Need info on when and where. ...
ygData.messageBody:
I would happly take the dive.
Need info on when and where.

--- jhenders@... wrote:
> On Fri, Oct 08/99,
> RON_TALBOT@... wrote:
> > From: RON_TALBOT@...
> >
> > Count me in. I would love to post a
> screenshot of the mass high dive
> > of death as a screen saver at work ;)
>
> I don't know if the list is slow or what, but so far
> I've had a rather
> underwhelming response to the idea. I'd like to see
> at least 20+ people
> committed to it before taking it further, otherwise
> it will be rather a
> non-event.
>
>
> --
> Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against
> Natural Stupidity.
